ayas.translation: When the Sky is cleft asunder;
When the Oceans are suffered to burst forth;
And when the Graves are turned upside down;-
(Then) shall each soul know what it hath sent forward and (what it hath) kept back.

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
ayas.translation: O man! What has seduced thee from thy Lord Most Beneficent?-
Him Who created thee. Fashioned thee in due proportion, and gave thee a just bias;

ayas.arabic: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
ayas.translation: In whatever Form He wills, does He put thee together.
ayas.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratim mā shā-a rakkabak

ayas.translation: Nay! But ye do reject Right and Judgment!
But verily over you (are appointed angels) to protect you,-
Kind and honourable,- Writing down (your deeds):
They know (and understand) all that ye do.
As for the Righteous, they will be in bliss;
And the Wicked - they will be in the Fire,
Which they will enter on the Day of Judgment,
And they will not be able to keep away therefrom.
And what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?
ayas.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā yawmud dīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayas.translation: Again, what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?
ayas.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmud dīn

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
ayas.translation: (It will be) the Day when no soul shall have power (to do) aught for another: For the command, that Day, will be (wholly) with Allah.
ayas.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsul linafsin shay-ā ۖ wal-amru yawma-idhin lillāh
